resources.string: Access to the camera is needed for detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Ocr dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage

“Easy Recharge” app do not collect any personal information. And the service provided by this app is not endorsed by respective service provider .This app integrates third party services “Google Admob” which may collect the information to provide relevant information according to their terms and condition.

Get started with EasyRecharge and start to recharge more easily with other lots of extra feature. Simply scan your pin number and recharge. Hold steadily and be patience your pin will be successfully recharged.
